Line 99: Line 99:
===2008-present: She Wolf and forthcoming Spanish album===
===2008-present: She Wolf and forthcoming Spanish album===
â
[[Image:Shakira photographed September 2009 cover of Rolling Stone.jpg|left|thumb|[[Shakira]] photographed in New York on September 12th, 2009 cover of ''Rolling Stone''. Photograph by [[Max Vadukul]]]]
 
During an online chat with her fans in ''El Heraldo'',<ref>[http://www.elheraldo.com.co/ELHERALDO/BancoConocimiento/S/soforo/soforo.asp?CodSeccion=16 http://www.elheraldo.com.co/ELHERALDO/BancoConocimiento/S/soforo/soforo.asp?CodSeccion=16 El Heraldo.com] ''Elherado.com''</ref> she revealed that she was going to start writing her New Album in February 2008. Furthermore, at the CD release party for Shakira's singer-songwriter cousin Isa Mebarak in [[Colombia]], Shakira's father William Mebarak stated that Shakira is currently at work beginning to write and produce new songs for her upcoming album. This is being done in "her own studio", which many fans thought to mean the studio at her home in the [[Bahamas]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.elheraldo.com.co/ELHERALDO/BancoConocimiento/S/soforo/soforo.asp?CodSeccion=16 |title=http://www.elheraldo.com.co/ELHERALDO/BancoConocimiento/S/soforo/soforo.asp?CodSeccion=16 |publisher=Elheraldo.com.co |date= |accessdate=2009-10-31}}</ref> Shakira recorded 2005's ''[[FijaciÃ³n Oral Vol. 1]]'' and ''[[Oral Fixation Vol. 2]]'' there, as well.
During an online chat with her fans in ''El Heraldo'',<ref>[http://www.elheraldo.com.co/ELHERALDO/BancoConocimiento/S/soforo/soforo.asp?CodSeccion=16 http://www.elheraldo.com.co/ELHERALDO/BancoConocimiento/S/soforo/soforo.asp?CodSeccion=16 El Heraldo.com] ''Elherado.com''</ref> she revealed that she was going to start writing her New Album in February 2008. Furthermore, at the CD release party for Shakira's singer-songwriter cousin Isa Mebarak in [[Colombia]], Shakira's father William Mebarak stated that Shakira is currently at work beginning to write and produce new songs for her upcoming album. This is being done in "her own studio", which many fans thought to mean the studio at her home in the [[Bahamas]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.elheraldo.com.co/ELHERALDO/BancoConocimiento/S/soforo/soforo.asp?CodSeccion=16 |title=http://www.elheraldo.com.co/ELHERALDO/BancoConocimiento/S/soforo/soforo.asp?CodSeccion=16 |publisher=Elheraldo.com.co |date= |accessdate=2009-10-31}}</ref> Shakira recorded 2005's ''[[FijaciÃ³n Oral Vol. 1]]'' and ''[[Oral Fixation Vol. 2]]'' there, as well.
